com.skobbler.ngx.sdktools.navigationui

Class SKToolsAdvicePlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.sdktools.navigationui.SKToolsAdvicePlayer

  • public class SKToolsAdvicePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to play an advice. An advice basically consists of a series of sound files that combined, represent the advice that should be played to the user.
